TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPoint extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties

summary.span: 表示儲存在 類別中的資料點。

span.span: Represents a data point that is stored in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別存放區內容相關聯的資料，以及資料點值。The class stores properties associated with data as well as data point values. 比方說，資料點，但它也會有色彩屬性、 背景影像 屬性，背景漸層停駐屬性等等。For example, a data point has a value, but it also has a color property, background image property, background gradient property, and so forth. 如需有關資料點屬性，請參閱類別概觀主題。For more information about data point properties, see the class overview topic. 每個資料點是由 X 值和一或多個 Y 值所組成。Each data point consists of an X-value and one or more Y-values. X 值可以是零，或您可以明確設定。The X-value can be zero, or you can set this explicitly. 泡泡圖、 k 線圖和股票圖以外的所有圖表類型需要每個點的只有一個 Y 值。Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except bubble, candlestick and stock charts. 因為有一個資料點是由多個值所組成，這些圖表類型會需要多個 Y 值。These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values. 例如，若要繪製一個股票圖的資料行，四個值都是必要： 高、 低、 開盤和收盤值。For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values. 資料可以在其中一個設計階段加入或執行的時間;您也可以使用資料繫結，在執行階段。Data can be added at either design time or run time; you can also use data-binding at run time.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可用來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 不過，強烈建議您改為將資料點加入在執行時，使用集合屬性。However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the collection property.

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標表示資料點是否標記為空白。

value.span: 如果資料點已標記為空白點則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the point is marked as an empty point; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`標示為空點的資料點。Set this property to `true` to mark a data point as an empty point. 或者是其中一個`InsertEmptyPoints`中的方法類別可用來將標記為空白點的遺漏資料。Alternatively one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the class can be used to mark missing data as empty points. 屬性會決定如何空資料點會顯示。The property determines how empty points are displayed.

summary.span: 設定資料點的 X 值和一個或多個 Y 值。

span.span: Sets the X-value and one or more Y-values of the data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以在執行階段設定的資料點的值。Use the method to set the value(s) of a data point at run-time. 請注意，是否您設定的 X 值為零 (0) 以外的值時，就會產生散佈圖。Note that if you set the X-value to a value other than zero (0), a scatter plot will be generated. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節屬性。For further details, see the Remarks section of the property. 請參閱下列表格以取得有效的.NET Framework 型別可用的物件型別參數的完整清單。Refer to the following table for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameter. |||| |-|-|-| |StringString|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |DecimalDecimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetValueY(object[] yValue) cil managed
Public Sub SetValueY (ParamArray yValue As Object())

param.name: yValue
param.span: 集合中 物件的 Y 值。

span.span: The Y-value(s) of a object in the collection.

param.span: 格式化為一個值或多個以逗號分隔的值。

span.span: Formatted as one or more values separated by commas.

summary.span: 設定單一資料點的 Y 值。

span.span: Sets the Y-value(s) of a single data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來設定 Y-值的資料點在執行階段。The property is used to set the Y-value(s) of a data point at run time. 泡泡圖、 k 線圖和股票圖以外的所有圖表類型需要每個點的只有一個 Y 值。Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except for bubble, candlestick and stock charts. 因為有一個資料點是由多個值所組成，這些圖表類型會需要多個 Y 值。These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values. 例如，若要繪製一個股票圖的資料行，四個值都是必要： 高、 低、 開盤和收盤值。For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values. 這個屬性傳回的陣列`double`值時用來擷取多個 Y 值。This property returns an array of `double` values when used to retrieve multiple Y-values. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性會決定中的所有資料都點的 Y 值的數目上限可以有。The property determines the maximum number of Y-values that all data points in a can have. 如果您指定超過允許的 Y 值數目，就會引發例外狀況。If you specify more than the allowable number of Y-values, an exception will be raised. > > 請參閱下列表格以取得有效的.NET Framework 型別可用的物件型別參數的完整清單：Refer to the following table for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameter: |||| |-|-|-| |StringString|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |DecimalDecimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double XValue { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.XValue : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定資料點的 X 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the X-value of a data point.
A that represents the X-value of a data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有圖表類型可以都顯示為其中一個散佈圖或非散佈圖等因為設定 X 值和 Y 值。All chart types can be displayed as either scatter plots or as non-scatter plots, because both X-values and Y-values can be set. 設定 X 值將導致散佈圖，而未設定這個屬性，這相當於將它設定為零，會導致非散佈圖。Setting an X-value will result in a scatter plot, whereas not setting this property—which is equivalent to setting it to zero—will result in a non-scatter plot. 比方說，若要繪製點狀圖類型，將資料點 X 值為零。For example, to draw a point chart type, add data points that have X-values of zero. 若要顯示傳統的散佈圖，加入資料點 X 值不是零。To display a traditional scatter chart, add data points that have X-values other than zero. 不需要設定資料點的 X 值。The X-values of data points are not required to be set. 如果未設定，會繪製資料點以循序方式，使用其索引值從。If they are not set, data points are plotted sequentially, using their index values from the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <double> ^ YValues { cli::array <double> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <double> ^ value); };
member this.YValues : double[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定資料點的 Y 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y-value(s) of a data point.

value.span: 值陣列，表示資料點的 Y 值。

span.span: An array of values that represent the Y-value(s) of a data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來設定資料點的 Y 值。The property is used to set the Y-values of data points. 泡泡圖、 k 線圖和股票圖以外的所有圖表類型需要每個點的只有一個 Y 值。Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except bubble, candlestick and stock charts. 因為有一個資料點是由多個值所組成，這些圖表類型會需要多個 Y 值。These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values. 例如，若要繪製一個股票圖的資料行，四個值都是必要： 高、 低、 開盤和收盤值。For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values. 屬性傳回的陣列`double`值時用來擷取 Y 值。The property returns an array of `double` values when used to retrieve the Y-values. **重要**屬性會決定中的所有資料都點的 Y 值的數目上限可以有。**Important** The property determines the maximum number of Y-values that all data points in a can have. 如果您指定超過允許的 Y 值數目，就會引發例外狀況。If you specify more than the allowable number of Y-values, an exception will be raised.
